Document Text:
B.C.'s richest billionaire, Jim Pattison, owns a chain of supermarkets that cancelled hazard pay months ago. His estimated net worth has ballooned $1.6 billion just in the 5 months since pandemic shut downs began. 

We need a Wealth Tax on the super-rich. Now. #bcpoli #cdnpoli
